questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and A decorative pavement
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A decorative pavement

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A mosaic design
C) A group of people
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A bird design
C) A fountain
D) A statue

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Grass
B) Sand
C) Mosaic tiles
D) Water

What type of bird is depicted in the mosaic?
A) Eagle
B) Sparrow
C) Penguin
D) Owl

What colors are predominantly used in the mosaic?
A) Blue and green
B) Red and yellow
C) Grey and yellow
D) White and blue

What materials are used to create the mosaic?
A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Stone tiles
D) Plastic

What is the shape of the mosaic design?  
A) Square  
B) Circle  
C) Triangle  
D) Like a bird

What surrounds the mosaic design?
A) Water
B) Grass
C) Stone pavement with dry grass
D) Sand

What is the texture of the mosaic?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Soft
D) Flexible

What is the bird's orientation in the mosaic?
A) Facing left
B) Facing right
C) Facing forward
D) Facing backward

What is the state of the surrounding pavement?
A) Clean
B) Covered with dry leaves and grass
C) Wet
D) Cracked

What is the primary color of the bird in the mosaic?
A) Blue
B) Grey
C) Red
D) Green

How is the bird's head positioned in the mosaic?
A) Tilted up
B) Tilted down
C) Facing straight
D) Turned sideways

What is the texture of the surrounding pavement?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Soft
D) Slippery

What is the bird's beak color in the mosaic?
A) Grey and Yellow
B) Red
C) Blue
D) Green

What does the mosaic artwork depict?
A) A landscape
B) An animal
C) An abstract design
D) A bird with spread wings

What is the dominant color in the mosaic artwork?
A) Blue
B) Yellow
C) Red
D) Green

What is the condition of the mosaic artwork?
A) Pristine and clean
B) Slightly dirty with leaves and debris
C) Broken and damaged
D) Covered with water
